thread.title: seen carrying cushions to Hindu prayer ritual |
thread.title_full: Miley Cyrus seen carrying cushions to Hindu prayer ritual | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.com Reporter
title: seen carrying cushions to Hindu prayer ritual |
text:
While America was glued to Super Bowl 51, Miley Cyrus opted to contemplate something other than football.
The pop star, 24, was seen carrying large colorful cushions into a building near her Malibu home on Sunday.
She wore a gray hoodie with a rainbow on the front and the words 'One Love.'
Religious date: Miley Cyrus opted to contemplate something other than football on Super Bowl Sunday and was seen carrying large colorful cushions into a building near her Malibu home
Miley, who's dating Australian actor Liam Hemsworth, showed off her slim figure in black skinny leggings and chunky black boots.
Her cushions were cylindrical and square with gold patterns and each featured long tassels.
Her hair was tied back into a high ponytail and she wore large hoop earrings.
The former Hannah Montana star later posted several images to Instagram explaining how she had spent her day.
Peace, man: The pop star, 24, wore a gray hoodie with a rainbow and the words 'One Love' on the front and showed off her slim frame with a pair of black leggings and knee-high boots
Had her hands full: Her colorful cushions were cylindrical and square with gold patterns and each featured long tassels
In one she showed a room with cushions arranged on mats on the floor which was scattered with flower petals.
There were candles in glass jars dotted around and next to the photos Quote: : 'Puja,' - using a Hindu word for a prayer ritual.
She also shared a picture of a close-up of a makeshift shrine consisting of images of gods and holy men with fruit and food in front of it.
'Fruit bowl over Super #offering,' she captioned the image.
Among her many tattoos, Miley has several that have meanings in Hinduism. She has a 'karma' finger inking and also the symbol 'Om' inked on the inside of her left wrist.
'Puja': Miley later posted a photo to her Instagram showing the cushions arranged on mats on the floor of a large room strewn with flower petals and dotted with candles
Prayers: She also showed a picture of a make-shift shrine consisting of pictures of holy men and gods with fruit and food in front of it
'Rose Angels': She also shared this pic of herself in high spirits
